name: Strangest Dream
description:
Strangest Dream

small ambient exploration game

=========================

Take control of a creature....

Discover forgotten structures lost in the ocean...

Explore wildlife...

=========================

This is my entry for the Adventure Jam 2022 !

Strangest Dream is a small low-rez ambient platformer exploration game with a little story in it.

It is HIGHLY recommended to play with a gamepad. 

=========================

CREDITS 

Fonts used in this game are Degheest By Ange Degheest + Camille Depalle + Eugénie Bidaut + Luna Delabre + Mandy Elbé + May Jolivet + Oriane Charvieux + Benjamin Gomez + Justine Herbel downloaded from Velvetyne Type Foundry 

Some textures come from PolyHaven

every other things is made by Lucas Hadjam 

=========================
